headlines.description: Diogo Jota's last-gasp equaliser earned Wolverhampton Wanderers a 1-1 draw at Crystal Palace on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jota's late goal earns Wolves a point at Palace

events.name: Manchester United at West Ham United

headlines.description: Marcus Rashford sustained an injury as Manchester United limped to a 2-0 defeat against West Ham on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rashford injured as Man United lose at West Ham

headlines.description: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang scored an 84th minute goal as 10-man Arsenal scraped out a 3-2 win at home against Aston Villa.
Liverpool made it six wins from six matches in the Premier League after claiming a nervous 2-1 win against Chelsea at Stamford Bridge on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool stay perfect with nervous win at Chelsea
